Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the dark bank of a stream running along the edge of the shadowy forest

Emerging from the wall of trees to the north is a clear stream that veers to the south. The forest continues along the western bank. The waters flow high and fast with the spring thaw as the supple grass sways easily in the breeze. Sunlight ripples over the surface of the creek in glittering patterns as the rays filter through the verdant green canopy.Moonlight casts its ethereal glow over the fields of verdant green grass and burbling creek. Thick green stalks of grass sway in the fields as the water burbles gently in the creek. The shade of the heavy green foliage offers a respite from the heat of the summer sun. The forest is dark with the impenetrable shadow of night, the fields of grassland lit only by the dim, starlight moonglow. The forest is a myriad of autumnal colors, fallen leaves clinging to the edges of the creek and decorating the surrounding ground. Sunlight filters through the thinning canopy in a rosy golden hue. Chill night air settles over the land in the dark of the night. Ice clings to the edges of the creek as the water bubbles onward, sunlight streaming through the bare branches of the trees doing little to free the air from the chill of winter.moonlight lending its dim glow to the chill dark of night.

the down-sloping bank of a stream
The down-sloping bank of a clear stream.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A constant trickling of water can be heard. \| \The sun casts a warm light on the clear stream.\\The light of night casts a reflective glow on the clear stream.\ \| Something falls into the stream with a gentle plop. \| A cluster of leaves float down the stream. \| Somewhere out of sight, a toad croaks. \| \The night air is filled with the sound of crickets.\ \A \{fat\|plump\|short\|stubby\|long\|scrawny\|small\} fish swims downstream.\ \}

X[S] \{ A constant trickling of water can be heard. \| \The sun casts a warm light on the clear stream.\\The light of night casts a reflective glow on the clear stream.\ \| Something falls into the stream with a gentle plop. \| A cluster of leaves float down the stream. \| Somewhere out of sight, a toad croaks. \| \The night air is filled with the sound of crickets.\ \A \{fat\|plump\|short\|stubby\|long\|scrawny\|small\} fish swims downstream.\ \}
